title: Survival Pack 1 - Everything Bundle
description: Music and audio for survival game
longDescription:
Within the Everything Bundle, is included the URBAN, VILLAGE, NATURE, and DUNGEON Survival Packs.


As a bonus for purchasing the Everything Bundle, we also have included the TITLE and BOSS packs, which also include full WAV FILES, LOOPS, and STEMS.


There are 3 folders included in each of the Survival packs, WAV FILES, LOOPS, and BGS.


You will find the full WAV files of each level of intensity in the WAV FILES folder.


In the WAV FILES folder, you’ll find full WAV files of four different intensities for this cue. Explore, Danger, Danger Plus, and Battle. They’ve been composed to seamlessly fade in and out of one another, so you don’t have to fuss with any edits. 


In the LOOPS folder, you will find intro, outro and loop files that you can use to create perpetually infinite scenes for your project! Also included are stingers that you can use to accentuate changes in intensities. 


The BGS folder is composed of our DAY and NIGHT BACKGROUNDS. These backgrounds have been sonically matched to be used with the music included in this pack. Use them to create an auditory bed for your soundscape, and use the BG STEMS to make your environment dynamic! Shut those crickets up with an explosion or gunshot. Bring out that knockabout when the wind picks up!

  • Danger - Crossfade Loop - Branching Intro - Branching Outro
